content:
Excellent adjustments! Focusing on core and glutes on Wednesdays will definitely help with your running and biking performance. And, of course, it's great that you're incorporating social rides with friends on Saturdays!

Here's the revised calendar:

**Weeks 1-2:**

| Day | Time | Workout | Duration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mon | 6:30 am | Swim (endurance) | 45 min |
| Tue | 6:30 am | Bike (easy spin) | 45 min |
| Wed | 6:30 am | Strength Training (core & glutes) | 45 min |
| Thu | 6:30 am | Run (intervals) | 45 min |
| Fri | 6:30 am | Rest or Active Recovery (e.g., yoga, walk) | 30 min |
| Sat | 7:00 am | Group Bike Ride (social) | 60 min |
| Sun | 7:00 am | Bike (brisk ride) | 60 min |

**Weeks 3-4:**

| Day | Time | Workout | Duration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mon | 6:30 am | Bike (hill repeats) | 45 min |
| Tue | 6:30 am | Strength Training (upper body) | 45 min |
| Wed | 6:30 am | Strength Training (core & glutes) | 45 min |
| Thu | 6:30 am | Run (tempo) | 45 min |
| Fri | 6:30 am | Rest or Active Recovery (e.g., yoga, walk) | 30 min |
| Sat | 7:00 am | Group Bike Ride (social) | 60 min |
| Sun | 7:00 am | Run (long, steady state) | 60 min |

Remember to adjust the intensity and duration of your workouts based on how your body feels. It's essential to listen to your body and not push yourself too hard, especially with the increased frequency and intensity of your training.

Keep me posted on your progress, and let me know if you need any further adjustments or guidance!
